title: Kinetic energy for horizontally thrown rock

content.prompt: What is the kinetic energy of the rock just before it hits the ground?

choices.label: 1 2   m v 0 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EE7@

1 2   m v 0 2 − m g h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42A9@

1 2   m v 0 2 + m g h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@429E@

m g h − 1 2   m v 0 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@429F@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
